channel.title: The Wilcoxon Rank-Sum Test on Amit Rajan
channel.description: Recent content in The Wilcoxon Rank-Sum Test on Amit Rajan

item.title: Hypothesis Testing (Part 4)
item.description: ### Distribution-Free Tests : The one assumption for the Student’s t tests performed above was the fact that the samples should come from the normal distribution. In distribution-free tests, this restriction is relaxed, i.e. the samnples are not required to come from any specific distribution. Distribution-free tests are sometimes called as nonparametric tests. Mainly, there are two types of distribution-free tests: Wilcoxon signed-rank test(test for population mean) and Wilcoxon rank-sum test / Mann-Whitney test (analogous to the two-sample t test).
